colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES 'JAM MTSAN LDAN BLA MA'I DRI MED GSUNG BZHIN DU, ,SKAL LDAN SLOB MAR PHAN PHYIR NYER BKOD PAS, , @006B DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUBS THABS NYUNG NGU RNAM GSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA'I DPON MOS SANGS RGYAS SGROL MA'I ZHAL 'DON DU DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGG'A LAM, ,DGE'O, ,)'
